name: Clean Harbors, Inc.
description: Clean Harbors, Inc. is a leading provider of environmental, energy, and industrial services throughout North America. Founded in 1980, the company has grown to be a prominent player in waste management and environmental services, committed to sustainability and compliance with environmental regulations. Clean Harbors offers a comprehensive range of services including hazardous waste disposal, industrial cleaning, emergency spill response, and environmental remediation. The company's innovative solutions help clients minimize their environmental impact and maintain regulatory compliance while optimizing operational efficiency. Clean Harbors operates numerous service locations and treatment facilities across the United States and Canada, providing essential services to a diverse set of industries, including oil and gas, chemical, manufacturing, and healthcare. With a focus on safety and sustainability, Clean Harbors continually invests in technology and training to enhance service delivery and environmental protection. The company aims to create a cleaner, safer environment through its dedicated workforce and commitment to responsible waste management practices.
